All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
AddStylusFromListActivity
This activity allows users to add cartridges by selecting them from a precompiled list.
AddStylusManuallyActivity
This activity allows users to add cartridges by manually filling in the required fields.
DataHelper
The DataHelper class contains methods for storing Stylus and StylusProfile objects in the database and retrieving them from the local SQLite database.
EditStylusActivity
This activity allows users to edit cartridge properties.
EditStylusClickListener
Implementing this interface allows an activity to listen to events for items in a RecyclerView
InitialSetupActivity
This activity is called if the initial setup has not been completed yet.
MainActivity
Main activity of the application.
PreferencesActivity
This activity allows users to change application preferences.
STimerApp
Represents the Stylus Timer application.
STimerBaseActivity
Base activity class extended by all activities in the app.
STimerPreferences
A singleton class that represents user details that are stored in SharedPreferences
Stylus
Stylus represents a single stylus/cartridge in the database.
StylusProfile
StylusProfile represents a single stylus profile in the database.
StylusViewAdapter
Implementation of RecyclerView.Adapter used by the Stylus Timer app.
StylusViewAdapter.ViewHolder
ViewHolder for Stylus objects
